description: Diamond Dan was like winning the Straight Guy Lottery: tall, handsome, very sexual and a bona fide ponderosa of a penis.This 21 year old has air of sexual confidence that can only come with a nine-inch cock that is six and one half inches around. Just hoping next time he'll save some for us!
title: Thick & Meaty, Scene #02
